meanings.definition: A track or course for racing vehicles.
meanings.sent1: The raceways at the park were filled with fast cars.
meanings.sent2: The raceways at the stadium were used for exciting competitions.
meanings.sent3: The raceways in the city were so busy, even the pigeons had to watch out!
meanings.sent4: Her determination was a raceway, propelling her towards success.
meanings.sent5: The raceways gleamed under the bright sun, inviting racers to test their speed.

meanings.definition: Channels or pathways for guiding electrical wires or cables.
meanings.sent1: The electrician carefully installed the raceways to keep the wires organized.
meanings.sent2: The raceways in the building ensured a neat and safe wiring system.
meanings.sent3: The raceways in the house were like little highways for the electricity!
meanings.sent4: His mind was a tangled mess until he organized his thoughts into neat raceways.
meanings.sent5: The raceways snaked through the walls, carrying power to every corner of the room.
